info.title: Costco Fulfillment API

delete.description: [In Design] Attempts cancellation of an order being fullfilled at Costco

parameters.name: ReasonCode
parameters.description:
The Costco Cancellation Reason Code

CUS - Customer Request
FRD - Fraud
DUP - Duplicate Order
CCD - CC Decline on Re-Auth
ERR - Error in processing Order
ANO - Authorization not obtained/card decline
OTH - Other

parameters.name: Reason
parameters.description:
Customer Service Notes Associated with Cancellation. 
Required for Reason Codes ERR and OTH

scopes.order operator: Can perform operations to capture orders and have them fulfilled by Costco
scopes.order fulfiller: Can perform operations to fulfill orders captured by Costco

memberNumber.description: The Costco membership number of the purchaser

memberName.description: The full name of the Costco member

membership.description: A representation of a Costco Member

totalDiscountAmount.description: Total discount amount of coupons applied to units of a line,  represented as a number

coupon.description: Coupon codes issued against line items by Costco promotional efforts.

description.example: Bad query parameter [$size]: Invalid integer value [abc]
description.description: A description of the error code. This description is meant to be used by the application developer to understand the issue, but shouldn't be displayed as-is to the end user.

reasonPhrase.description: A more contextual message describing what may have gone wrong.

Error.description: This general error structure is used throughout this API.

feeSKU.description: Costco Provided Linked Fee Item Number

feeUnitPrice.description: Unit Price of Fee Item, represented as a number

taxable.description: True False value indicating if the fee is taxable

feeDescription.description: Costco Provided Linked Fee Descriptions by locale

linkedFee.description: Linked Fees represent "outside" taxes passed on to consumers for various government programs.

partnerOrderNumber.description: The order number generated by non-Costco systems

placeOrderTime.description: the moment at which the order was generated in ISO 8601 format.

currency.description: the currency code for which all monetary values will be assumed

subTotal.description: The total cost of the order minus shipping and taxes, represented as a number

taxTotal.description: The total cost of taxes on the order across items, shipping and linked fees, represented as a number

shippingTotal.description: The total cost of shipping on the order minus taxes on shipping, represented as a number

channel.description: The sales channel on which the order originated

orderSummary.description: A Representation of an Order Header

referenceNumber.description: The unique id of the line item that is shipped

itemNumber.description: The Costco item number to be fulfilled

quantity.description: The quantity of units to be fulfilled

unitItemSellPrice.description: The sales price of unit, represented as a number

unitItemTaxPrice.description: The cost of tax for a unit, represented as a number

unitShippingPrice.description: The cost of shipping for a unit, represented as a number

unitShippingTaxPrice.description: The cost of tax on shipping of a unit, represented as a number

coupons.description: A collection of Costco coupons applied to a line

linkedFees.description: A collection of linked fees associated with a line

lineItem.description: A Representation of an Order Line

referenceNumber.description: The unique id of the line item that is  being returned

itemNumber.description: The Costco item number to be returned

refundAmount.description: The refund amount, represented as a number

city.description: City, town or commune. May also include dependent localities or sublocalities (e.g. neighborhoods or suburbs).

state.description: Top-level administrative subdivision of the country (e.g. "CA")

countryCode.description: The CLDR territory code of the country to which an item will ship

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the person receiving the delivery.

shippingAddressReference.description: A reference to a shipping address in a shippingAddress array

methodName.description: The name of the shipping method.

deliveryDetail.description: A request for shipment to a shipment location
